text:
Confirming something...
Is it okay to have free time before the sales?

Of course.
...Do you have somewhere you want to go?

I want to try local delicacies,
and if possible, I want to hit up tourist spots too.

After all, wouldn't you be happy
if your favorite talked about their hometown?

Or if a girl lively talks about her hometown,
wouldn't you feel like supporting her?

I see.
...Sorry, I had a moment of doubt, forgive me...

Hahaha, did you think I was all about playing around?
It's fine.

It's also a proposal full of playing around! You can't have a
proper conversation if you're not seriously enjoying yourself!
